extensionDescription.message: Adds an option to close all tabs that are bookmarked.

menuNoTabs.description: Menu label when no tabs are bookmarked

menuSingleTab.description: Menu label when 1 tab is bookmarked

menuMultipleTabs.description: Menu label when multiple tabs are bookmarked

notificationSingle.description: Notification message for single tab closed

notificationMultiple.description: Notification message for multiple tabs closed
